items.title: Fame-hungry influencers are renting £500,000 supercars they can’t even drive
items.description: Some influencers are so uninterested in driving the cars they haven't even started their engines, Starr Luxury Cars boss Ike Ordor said.

items.title: ‘Dystopian’ toilets won’t give you loo roll unless you watch an advert first
items.description: If you don't want to watch an advert, you can pay 0.5 RMB - about 5p - to skip the ads.

items.title: People think China ‘intercepted a meteor or UFO’ after fireball video goes viral
items.description: That's almost certainly not what happened, but there's no official answer yet.

items.title: Bizarre ‘crash-proof’ plane covers itself in giant airbags to keep you safe
items.description: It's a 'promise of survival', according to the designers.

items.title: Putin’s quest for immortality including ‘viable’ head transplant surgery
items.description: There are numerous scientists 'working on developing technologies for whole-body transplantation', it's been claimed.
